text:
?
Are you from the Home Economics Room?

My hands... are in the shape of a cat...
just... decorating...

Oh, it's Natsuha.
What are you doing...?
The knife... should always be... at a right angle...

(She's really focused...
It seems best not to interrupt.)

Yeah, I heard some noise.
Are you preparing dinner for tonight?

Yes, I had some free time,
so I asked everyone to practice cutting vegetables.

More importantly, look! Producer!
Don't you think I cut this tomato very well?

Oh, indeed!
It's perfectly smooth, making it look delicious.

See!
I'll keep cutting like this!

I'll show you how well I can cut the next one too,
so please watch!
